name: Gmail 2: CASTRO FASHION II (BurnOmania Style III)
description:
v0.1.6
- Hotfix solved bugs due GMAIL changes.
- Plus Some cosmetic changes.

v0.1.5
Hotfix solved bugs due GMAIL changes.

v0.1.2
- Fix NOTIFICATION & ERROR MESSAGES bug.
- Plus other various tweaks & fixes...

v0.1.1
Minor tweaks & fixes...

v0.1
First public release.

Mod for my previous GM2 skin http://userstyles.org/styles/6446 .  For those who dislike blue color and for SAP users ;) who can't stand the light blue color anymore, so here we go with a darker one.  Specially for you guys...  :)

Regards...

(Segoe UI font is needed)
